comments:
I've seen the following exception several times now. It comes whenever a Connector Project is created and the workbench is restarted. The first time the project is expanded in the Project Explorer, it shows fine. Once the workbench is restarted, any attempt to load it (either in the Project Explorer or just through an editor) and the following exception pops up.

org.eclipse.emf.common.util.WrappedException: org.eclipse.emf.ecore.xmi.PackageNotFoundException: Package with uri 'http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/j2ee' not found. (platform:/resource/TestConnector/connectorModule/META-INF/ra.xml, 2, 241)

Caused by: org.eclipse.emf.ecore.xmi.PackageNotFoundException: Package with uri 'http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/j2ee' not found. (platform:/resource/TestConnector/connectorModule/META-INF/ra.xml, 2, 241)

Closing resolved bugs that are WONTFIX, DUPL, or WORKSFORME.
